title: Metadata search engine enhancements
description: Cardano BI already has a search engine for metadata messages, but metadata use has exploded and we need to change to make it even better
solution: As the number of potential search results are constantly increasing, we need to add new tools so users effectively find what they want
experience: University degree software engineer, 20 years experience as dev. and solution architect. Developer of site https://bi.stakepoolcentral.com
